## handles() function

Does the provided Intent / Handler handle the provided ID in some way or another.

This checks redirect, content, &amp; forward for the ID as a key.

Optionally, you can specify if you only want to check either redirect, content, or forward. The default is to check all three.


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function handles(intent: Intent | Handler, id: string, how?: HandledIn): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  intent | [Intent](./stentor-models.intent.md) \| [Handler](./stentor-models.handler.md) |  |
|  id | string |  |
|  how | [HandledIn](./stentor-utils.handledin.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
